alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued September 22 at 10:03AM MDT until September 23 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Widespread, sub-freezing temperatures ranging from 25 to 30 degrees. * WHERE...Star Valley, Upper Green River Basin Foothills, Upper Green River Basin and South Lincoln County. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locations such as Cokeville, Bondurant, and Daniel will likely see the coldest temperatures. Similar low temperatures are possible again Saturday night into Sunday morning. Freeze Warnings are issued until season ending temperatures occur (28 degrees), and then are not issued again.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: South Lincoln County; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
